subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: What is the constitutional provision for Panchayati Raj in India?
question_hi: भारत में पंचायती राज के निष्कारण के विभाग क्या है?
explanation_en: The constitutional provision for Panchayati Raj in India is represented by the Central Act (73rd & 74th Amendments).
explanation_hi: भारत में पंचायती राजनी का निवृत्ति के मुख्य कानून (73rd & 74th Amendments) है।
